panels.scene_description: Comic panel: Ava in Kenyan print blouse points a laser at a flowchart projected on screen; the Freeze node glows red; Murphy the duck wears a judge wig.

speech_bubbles.ava: Freeze means stop shipping, start fixing.

panels.narration: Governance flowchart highlights the freeze branch.

panels.scene_description: Ava presents a colour‑coded RACI grid on a touchscreen and highlights the SRE column with a neon marker.

speech_bubbles.ava: Team, SRE holds the gavel on reliability.

panels.scene_description: Buildkite pipeline sidebar shows a red gate icon; Ava slams a big red "PAUSE" stamp on the screen while teammates gasp behind her.
panels.narration: CI gate blocks a risky release based on burn‑rate.

panels.scene_description: Line graph overlay of revenue curve versus innovation curve; Ava stands thoughtful, coffee mug labelled 'budget != uptime'.

speech_bubbles.ava: Budget and uptime are different currencies.

panels.narration: Graph visualises the trade‑off between reliability and velocity.

panels.scene_description: Grafana dashboard with four burn‑rate windows; Ava inset circles the 30‑minute spike in red.
Horizontal incident timeline with icons for detect, freeze, mitigation steps; Ava narrates in bottom caption.

speech_bubbles.ava: Timeline tells the story of a controlled outage.

panels.narration: Incident markers plotted across the outage minutes.

panels.scene_description: Stylised playbook cover on a desk: gears, checklists, SRE logo; Ava hands a copy to a junior SRE.

speech_bubbles.ava: Playbook is your shield in chaos.

panels.scene_description: Courtroom‑style comic: Ava wearing a judge robe slams a gavel on a deploy button; caption 'Freeze enacted'.
panels.narration: Symbolic gavel moment underscores decisive governance.

panels.scene_description: Semi‑circular error‑budget gauge with the needle buried in the red zone; crisp infographic style, no characters present.
Stylised Slack chat: Bot posts 'Deploy blocked – error budget exhausted'; Ava reacts with a thumbs‑up emoji.

speech_bubbles.ava: Bot saved us a 3 a.m. wake‑up.

panels.narration: Automation enforces policy without human intervention.

panels.scene_description: Infographic table showing downtime minutes versus revenue loss per quarter; Nairobi skyline silhouette in the background.
panels.narration: Quarterly cost analysis links reliability to finance.

panels.scene_description: Heatmap grid: services on Y‑axis, months on X‑axis, colour intensity shows budget spend percentage; Ava points at the deepest red cell.
panels.narration: Heatmap pinpoints heavy budget consumers for review.
